title: Bug 18016most menu actions should be disabled for cus from repo
description: 1. in repository view, open a .java file2. there are 6 menu entries enabled and none does anythingthese are:open declarationopen type hierarchyopen super implementationshow in packages viewcopysearch 'copy' could be made to mean something (but it does not work as of now !)but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.3. also 'convert line delimiters' should be disabled4. structured selection too (see bug 18015)marking as major  likely to happen to many users
